website_summaries.verdict: With its practical and straightforward features, the Under Armour Drift 2 scored well with many of its wearers. Various runners had positive remarks on the shoe’s appearance and structure; on the other hand, some users experienced some size and fit issues.
pros: One user said this running shoe was great for everyday sprints, as well as long city walks and quick workouts
Many wearers felt it was lightweight and convenient for all-day wear
A reviewer was satisfied with the foot-wrapping fit of the shoe
A lot of runners liked the no-lace-tying construction as it enabled laid-back
The exclusive upper material was easy to clean, according to a customer
Some users were impressed with the performance of the outsole
cons: The back of the upper rubbed against the skin and caused blisters, a reviewer said
A customer said the entryway of the shoe was small and was quite a problem to wear
The heel tended to slip while running, a user mentioned
Several runners thought it needed a break-in period before getting comfortable to

customer_reviews.title: Painful experience
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this shoes right now at work for the first time and i cant wait to get home and take them off . under armour didn’t add any comfort to the back of the ankle i uploaded a photo showing the problem for me i cant believe how Painful and uncomfortable is that area they should’ve added normal comfort in that part at least Update I got home almost limping because those shoes hurt my skin too much
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are a little difficult to get on but once on are very form fitting to the foot and very comfortable. I think once they have been broken in a little they then might be a little easier to get on.
customer_reviews.author: mandrews46

customer_reviews.title: Excellent good looking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable good looking shoes once you get them on. Really a son of a gun getting them on. Maybe time will teach me how to better get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Alekona

customer_reviews.title: I have been very happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with these shoes. They are very comfortable and slip on very quick and easy. They seem to be holding up quite well. I sometimes work 14 hour days and my feet aren't killing me. Absolutely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Get them
customer_reviews.text: Wear these every day at work and it’s been 6 months and have minimal wear and still really comfortable. I love that they have no shoe laces and just bungee kind of laces for easy on and off
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: but actually not the end of the world as I use them for running so the support is good. Otherwise they are comfortable and in look good
customer_reviews.text: They are a little snug, but actually not the end of the world as I use them for running so the support is good. Otherwise they are comfortable and in look good. Seem to be good quality and are holding up after a few weeks of fairly solid use. At the price point I would most definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i would only use these for running or working out in NOT STYLE!!
customer_reviews.text: got these for my boyfriends birthday, his old running shoes were falling apart. he said he loves them they and every comfortable but for only so long cause they start to rub the back of his ankle causing blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Breana

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes ever! They are a little tight putting them on the first few times, but they loosen up nicely. And the best thing is you don’t have to lace them up. The toggle feature is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey P.

customer_reviews.title: A bit large.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked good. But I couldn't get them right enough to stop slipping of the heel.
customer_reviews.author: john e carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but very tight collars
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable sole However the elastic at the collar/top is so tight I'm almost getting a blister Hope it loosens with more wear
customer_reviews.author: TWF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and wears them regularly for school.
customer_reviews.author: galmonte

customer_reviews.title: ... for someone very picky about foot wear and they love them. They look nice
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for someone very picky about foot wear and they love them. They look nice, and have held up incredibly well. He raves about how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The elastic around the top is very tight. I'm hoping it will loosen up with wear.
customer_reviews.author: jchuckjohns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Like the quality, price and color and the fit.
customer_reviews.author: edc

customer_reviews.title: Rough Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend. If I would have known they would chafe my ankles to the point where one of them was left a liitke bruised, I would have not bought them. The sock fit on top was the problem. Hard to put on and unstable
customer_reviews.author: Nevid Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Poor shoe lace design
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a decent shoe. Not too sure about running as the arch support seems a little weak. Shoe lace broke within the first 6 weeks of use. The laces are obviously not easy to replace. Guess I'm stuck with a knot in the interim.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ingwersen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and I will purchase the black and white ones
customer_reviews.author: Flight attendant

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this model of shoe because it's so comfortable and light weight I definitely will buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Dimas  Flores Rico

customer_reviews.title: A present surprise
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable And not bad to run in like them better then some Nike shoes out
customer_reviews.author: nathan nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of slipping them on. Fits perfect. Very comfortable for casual or gym.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son to use as uniform shoes. Unfortunately, they are very difficult to get on and fit poorly. Once on and worn for a bit, they tear apart his achilles area.... huge blisters on both feet and entire area from heel up rubbed red. They've gone into the Goodwill pile.
customer_reviews.author: KFV

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable on his sensitive feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband has Lyme Disease and suffers from neuropathy. He loves these shoes. They are very comfortable on his sensitive feet.
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and fit. Using these for jogging on the treadmill
customer_reviews.author: David Ruize

customer_reviews.title: Fits great.  Last long
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. My kid loves not to tie shoes !! Quick and comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: donovan garner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love em! Great fit, light! Want more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great design! Excellent quality. Very comfortable. I wear these sneakers with pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Gusarov_Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Excelllent fit, super light and look stylish.
customer_reviews.author: hira

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed your heel
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this shoe but it destroyed my heel. There is not much else to say....the photos tell the story. I wore them two days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine, but look bigger than another same size UA shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, design and the comfort of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He says it's very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this shoe. He says it's very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: nina cash

customer_reviews.title: I like shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very conmfortable, the laces took a minute to get used too
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Drift 2 Competition Running Shoes
feature_bullets: EVA insole full length for comfort and custom fit
Intersuola padded EVA for light conduction and responsive
Rubber sole covering traction strategically positioned high impact areas for a longer life with less weight
